overview: in the midst of Modern Jakarta's fast-paced working class world, Tobing, a film projectionist falls in love with a 1960's New Wave picture actress. Portraying parallels between his friends Aruna, a food kiosk server and the picture actress. Tobing find himself in a blinding desire which results in him getting fired from the cinema. In the end he will choose to face or not to face reality.
title: Us, In Frames
